channel.title: Everything but 1
channel.description:
okay to keep this simple, ive made a server and it works fine at my house using the no-ip adress i made pur3pkz.servegame.com, it also works on the computer downstairs which is connected to the same router, but when i try to upload it to the moparscape server page it says it is offline, and when i ask my friends to try it at their houses it says error connecting to server, i followed the portforwarding guide and the how to create a runescape private server guide the best that i could and it works for me but not for other people.
ive added a few pictures of what is happening with some comments in them please help me if you can! :) use the links below to see the pictures because i got an error when trying to attach them something about the file name being the same... ;)
http://www.bartscape.com/login.bmp http://www.bartscape.com/ingame.bmp http://www.bartscape.com/friendsfail.bmp http://www.bartscape.com/signup1.bmp http://www.bartscape.com/signupfail.bmp
IVE JUST REALISED IVE DOUBLE POSTED SORRY!

item.title: Everything but 1
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“bloodpk3r, post:1, topic:217929”]okay to keep this simple, ive made a server and it works fine at my house using the no-ip adress i made pur3pkz.servegame.com, it also works on the computer downstairs which is connected to the same router, but when i try to upload it to the moparscape server page it says it is offline, and when i ask my friends to try it at their houses it says error connecting to server, i followed the portforwarding guide and the how to create a runescape private server guide the best that i could and it works for me but not for other people.

ive added a few pictures of what is happening with some comments in them please help me if you can! use the links below to see the pictures because i got an error when trying to attach them something about the file name being the same…

http://www.bartscape.com/login.bmp
http://www.bartscape.com/ingame.bmp
http://www.bartscape.com/friendsfail.bmp
http://www.bartscape.com/signup1.bmp
http://www.bartscape.com/signupfail.bmp

IVE JUST REALISED IVE DOUBLE POSTED SORRY![/quote]

Please do not ever host a BMP file to the internet.

BMP is a Windows bitmap image and is only recognized by Windows.

[hr]

[quote=“i pk 120, post:6, topic:217929”]poeple cant connect to ur server if u dont have a router even if ur conencting to 1 u need to HAVE router[/quote]Wrong, if you don’t have a router that means your computer is at risk, however that means you don’t have to portforward

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @bloodpk3r bloodpk3r
item.description:

yes i have msn sorry i havent been on my msn is matthewsking@hotmail.co.uk[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2008, 12:38:00 PM[/size][hr]when you get a chance to contact me please do[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2008, 11:51:31 AM[/size][hr]can any1 else help if the other guy cant plz?

item.title: Everything but 1
item.dc:creator: @pwnm30rdi3 pwnm30rdi3
item.description:
@pwnm30rdi3 wrote:

[quote=“bloodpk3r, post:5, topic:217929”]yeh i can wait till you get home depending on how long you will be lol urmm yeh my router is dg834PN thts its number anyway soz i took so long to reply was editing server on a few glitches * was bored *

ill keep checking this topic until you get home but i wont be in some of tmoz hopefully we can talk soon[/quote]

Ok, do you have a msn?

i pk 120:

poeple cant connect to ur server if u dont have a router even if ur conencting to 1 u need to HAVE router

No, routers are NOT needed to run or connect to another server. A router is a device that forwards data packets between computer networks. So basically it transfers data between computers connected together in a network. If you have a Modem or an Internet connection then you can connect and host servers, therefore no router is needed, NOOB!

Read full topic

item.title: Everything but 1
item.dc:creator: @bloodpk3r bloodpk3r
item.description:
@bloodpk3r wrote:

i have the server on when im trying to sign it up it just doesnt come up and the port forwarding is tricky because ive got a difficult router to do it with and the guide on portforward.com isnt easy to follow for this router… so if you can teach how me how to portforward it correctly it would be nice i use netgear… but as far i know ive portforwarded it correctly… the no-ip part is easy to follow as far as im concerned though… :eek:

item.title: Everything but 1
item.dc:creator: @pwnm30rdi3 pwnm30rdi3
item.description:
@pwnm30rdi3 wrote:

You have to have the server online, to play it or to advertise it…
If your server is on, sounds like u haven’t set-up your port forwarding right or your no-ip stuff.
